title: Issue a Letter of Credit
description: A corporate client needs to issue a standby letter of credit (L/C) to a supplier as a guarantee of payment.

tasks.description: Gather all required L/C application details: beneficiary, amount, expiry date, and terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately collects all necessary information for the L/C.

tasks.description: Perform a credit check and place a hold on the company's funds or credit line for the L/C amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the company has sufficient credit and places a hold on the facility.

tasks.description: Issue the letter of credit and send it to the beneficiary via SWIFT.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully issues the L/C and provides the SWIFT confirmation to the client.
